      • createFileB64

        public static String createFileB64(String conn,
                                   SyncDoc photo,
                                   io.odysz.semantics.IUser usr,
                                   DocTableMeta meta,
                                   io.odysz.semantic.DATranscxt st,
                                   io.odysz.transact.sql.Update onFileCreateSql)
                            throws io.odysz.transact.x.TransException,
                                   SQLException,
                                   IOException

        Create a doc record with a local file, e.g. h_photos - call this after duplication is checked.

        This method will insert record, and can trigger ExtFilev2 handling.

        Photo is created as in the folder of user/[photo.folder]/;
        Photo's device and family are replaced with session information.

        Parameters:
        conn -
        photo - with photo.uri that is the entire base-64 encoded string
        usr -
        meta -
        st -
        onFileCreateSql -
        Returns:
        doc id, e.g. pid
        Throws:
        io.odysz.transact.x.TransException
        SQLException
        IOException

      • resolvePrivRoot

                                     DocTableMeta meta,
                                     String conn)
        Resolve file uri with configured Semantics handler, DASemantics.smtype.extFile.
        Parameters:
        uri -
        meta -
        conn -
        Returns:
        decode then concatenated absolute path, for file accessing.
        See Also:
        EnvPath.decodeUri(String, String)
